sentences_texts: I've had the Jellyfish, Horse Mackerel, Blue Fin Tuna and the Sake Ikura roll among others, and the Jellyfish, Horse Mackerel, Blue Fin Tuna and Sake Ikura roll were all good.
sentences_opinions: Jellyfish positive <sep> Horse Mackerel positive <sep> Blue Fin Tuna positive <sep> Sake Ikura roll positive

sentences_texts: So inexcpensive that you'd wonder about the sanity of the owners, if the owners weren't such good cooks.

I've been to at Cafe Spice probably 5-8 times, Cafe Spice is probably still the best Indian restaurant around Union Square.
Don't judge this place prima facie, you have to try the place to believe it, a home away from home for the literate heart.

The Four Seasons has history and Four Seasons is a sort of landmark of New York City restaurants, but trust me, the Four Seasons will charge you through the nose just so that you can say "I've been to the four seasons restaurant".
sentences_opinions: The Four Seasons neutral <sep> The Four Seasons negative

sentences_texts: On Friday night the busboy was sulky verging on rude; busboy brought the fries (ordered for the entrees) twice before the appetizers came and then again the minute we'd finished them and looked put out to be asked to take the empty plates away.
The scallops are apparently cooked in a black olive butter which really makes the scallops unique (not to mention tasty).
The potato balls were not dry at all... in fact the potato balls was buttery.
While dining on a delicate lamb carpaccio, and grilled skate wing, the owner explained that due to low lunch-time patronage, the owner may be discontinuing lunch altogether.
My husband and I thougt it would be great to go to the Jekyll and Hyde Pub for our anniversary, and to our surprise the Jekyll and Hyde Pub was fantastic.
